hooks.prompt:
Review this session and determine if Claude created any NEW capabilities that should be documented.

New capabilities include:
- New scripts in scripts/ or bin/
- New skills in .claude/skills/
- New launchd services
- New MCP integrations
- Significant new features or workflows

If new capabilities were created, respond with:
{"ok": false, "message": "New capabilities created: [list them]. Remind Claude to update: inventory.md, decisions.md (if architectural), and relevant skill files."}

If no new capabilities, or if documentation was already updated, respond with:
{"ok": true}
